00027 Implemente_instanciable(Calculer_Moments,"Calculer_Moments",Interprete_geometrique_base);

00029 // printOn et readOn

00031 Sortie& Calculer_Moments::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00032 {
00033   return s << que_suis_je() << "\n";
00034 }

00036 Entree& Calculer_Moments::readOn(Entree& is )

00040 
00041 Entree& Calculer_Moments::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00042 {
00043   Motcle nom_var;
00044   associer_domaine(is);
00045   c.resize_array(dimension);
00046   Domaine& dom=domaine();
00047   is >> nom_var;
00048   Cerr << nom_var << finl;
00049   dom.zone(0).Moments_a_imprimer()=1;
00050   if(nom_var=="calcul")
00051     {
00052       Cerr << "Calculation of center of gravity " << nom_var<< finl;
00053       dom.zone(0).calculer_mon_centre_de_gravite(c);
00054     }
00055   else if (nom_var=="centre_de_gravite")
00056     {
00057       Cerr << "Center of gravity imposed, of dimension " << dimension << finl;
00058       is >> c[0];
00059       is >> c[1];
00060       if (dimension==3)
00061         is >> c[2];
00062       dom.zone(0).exporter_mon_centre_de_gravite(c);
00063     }
00064   else
00065     {
00066       Cerr << nom_var << " is not recognized." << finl;
00067       exit();
00068     }
00069   return is;
00070 }
